about_the_game: Welcome to the haunting soundtrack of "Last Bloody Snack," the legendary 2D horror game that will take you on a journey of terror and mystery. Prepare to immerse yourself in the eerie and sinister atmosphere of this dark world, guided by the melancholic melodies composed entirely by a talented artist under the pseudonym "Metal." Each track captures the essence of despair and fear, adding depth and emotion to your gaming experience. Let the haunting tunes accompany your every move as you navigate through the twisted corridors and face the horrors that await. Get ready to have your senses captivated by this chilling musical masterpiece.
